actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain individual taxpayers to postpone their estimated tax payments until the end of the year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers with earned income of less than $10,000, and who are not subject to withholding, to postpone their estimated tax payments to the end of the year at half the normal interest rate.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit certain individual taxpayers to postpone their estimated tax payments until the end of the year.
